about_the_game:
CHOOSE YOUR SACRIFICE:


In Realms of Wilorth, a retro-styled action roguelike, you guide the souls of sacrificed warriors across five different elemental-themed realms in search of the seeds of power coveted by a powerful sorcerer.

Combat is elemental-based, with each element having its own strengths and weaknesses. Nature slows enemies, water pushes them back, fire burns them, holy protects you with a shield, darkness steals life from opponents, and abyss doesn't have any weaknesses or strengths ( or does it ? ).

Delve into five different elemental-themed realms, defeat the guardians that protect the seeds and retrieve those elements for yourself.

The characters:



 Knight: Specializing in close combat, the Knight has the highest defense of all playable characters. His attacks generally affect an area, and his shield is resistant, but only to attacks coming from the aimed direction. His charged attack is a powerful "beam" of light, while his special attack is a quick sword spin. He uses energy as a resource for his charged and special attacks.
Mage: The most powerful in terms of pure damage, the Mage specializes in area damage. His defense is a weak bubble that returns part of the blocked damage as mana to cast his spells. His dodge damages enemies both on exit and arrival, and his basic attacks do not require mana. His charged attack is an elemental whirlwind that deals damage in a large area and returns mana for each damage "tick" it has dealt.

Rogue: The fastest of all characters, the Rogue specializes in ranged attacks. She starts with more dodge charges, and her dodges damage everything they pass through. She can become invulnerable for a brief moment, allowing her to ignore area and magical attacks. Her charged attack is an arrow that teleports her, and her special attack is an especially powerful arrow. She uses dodge charges as a resource for her attacks.

With every level gained, choose a game-changing perk to help you along the way. Each map is procedurally generated, providing interesting replayability as you navigate through dungeons and challenge the guardians to retrieve the seeds of power.

Will you face the realm guardians to retrieve the seed or delve into the dungeons to challenge the dragon and retrieve valuable golden seeds? The choice is yours.

"Tarot" card art by @Bronnzze



When Wilorth calls, souls ought to listen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A10-9700E / Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Please note that the game may run with lower system specifications, but the overall experience may be impacted.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700 / Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 6600
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: Please note that these are the recommended system specifications for an optimal experience. While the game may run with lower specifications, it may impact the overall performance.

short_description: Guide sacrificed warriors through elemental realms in 'Realms of Wilorth', a retro-styled action roguelike. Choose the Knight, Mage, or Rogue and defeat guardians to retrieve power seeds. Gain game-changing perks to level up in procedurally generated maps and become unstoppable!
